statements: SELECT * FROM dresses;
SELECT dress_name FROM dresses;
SELECT dress_size FROM dresses ORDER BY dress_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM dresses WHERE dress_size = 'M';
SELECT id, dress_name FROM dresses ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, dress_name, dress_size FROM dresses WHERE id = 1;
SELECT dress_name, id, dress_size FROM dresses WHERE dress_size = 'S';
SELECT * FROM dresses ORDER BY dress_name DESC;
SELECT id, dress_name FROM dresses WHERE dress_size IN ('S', 'M');
SELECT id, dress_name, dress_size FROM dresses WHERE dress_size LIKE '%XL%' AND dress_name ILIKE 'Red%';
SELECT dress_name, price FROM dresses WHERE dress_size = 'M'
SELECT * FROM dresses ORDER BY dress_name DESC
SELECT dress_name, dress_size, price FROM dresses WHERE price < 100
SELECT dress_name, dress_size, price FROM dresses WHERE dress_size IN ('S', 'M', 'L')
SELECT stock_id, quantity FROM stock ORDER BY quantity
SELECT dress_name, dress_size, price FROM dresses WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT dress_name, quantity FROM dresses JOIN stock ON dresses.dress_id = stock.dress_id WHERE stock.quantity > 10;
SELECT dress_name, dress_size, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM dresses JOIN stock ON dresses.dress_id = stock.dress_id GROUP BY dress_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT dress_name, dress_size, price FROM dresses WHERE dress_size IN ('S', 'M', 'L') ORDER BY dress_name ASC;
SELECT dress_name, price FROM dresses WHERE dress_id IN (SELECT dress_id FROM stock WHERE quantity > 0) ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM dresses;
SELECT dress_name, size FROM dresses WHERE dress_id = 1;
SELECT dress_name, size, quantity FROM dresses JOIN stock ON dresses.dress_id = stock.dress_id WHERE stock.quantity > 0;
SELECT dress_name, size, quantity FROM dresses JOIN stock ON dresses.dress_id = stock.dress_id JOIN sizes ON stock.size_id = sizes.size_id WHERE dresses.size = 'M';
SELECT dress_name, size, quantity FROM dresses JOIN stock ON dresses.dress_id = stock.dress_id JOIN sizes ON stock.size_id = sizes.size_id ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT dress_name, size, quantity FROM dresses JOIN stock ON dresses.dress_id = stock.dress_id
SELECT * FROM dresses JOIN stock ON dresses.dress_id = stock.dress_id JOIN sizes ON stock.size_id = sizes.size_id
SELECT dress_name, size_name, quantity FROM dresses JOIN stock ON dresses.dress_id = stock.dress_id JOIN sizes ON stock.size_id = sizes.size_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_stock FROM stock
SELECT dress_name, size, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM dresses JOIN stock ON dresses.dress_id = stock.dress_id GROUP BY dress_name, size
SELECT * FROM dresses;
SELECT dress_name, size FROM dresses WHERE size='M';
SELECT dress_name, stock_quantity FROM dresses JOIN dress_inventory ON dresses.dress_id = dress_inventory.dress_id;
SELECT * FROM dress_inventory WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY stock_quantity DESC;
SELECT dress_name, size_name, order_date FROM dresses JOIN orders ON dresses.dress_id = orders.dress_id JOIN sizes ON orders.size_id = sizes.size_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM dresses;
SELECT dress_name, size FROM dresses WHERE size='S';
SELECT dress_name, size, stock_quantity FROM dresses JOIN dress_inventory ON dresses.dress_id = dress_inventory.dress_id WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT order_id, dress_name, size_name, order_date FROM orders JOIN dresses ON orders.dress_id = dresses.dress_id JOIN sizes ON orders.size_id = sizes.size_id;
SELECT * FROM dress_inventory WHERE dress_id IN (SELECT dress_id FROM dresses WHERE size='M');
SELECT dress_name, stock_quantity FROM dresses
SELECT dress_id, dress_name, dress_size FROM dresses
SELECT order_id, dress_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers
SELECT size_id, size_name FROM sizes
SELECT dress_name, stock_quantity FROM dresses WHERE stock_quantity > 0
SELECT dress_name, dress_size, stock_quantity FROM dresses INNER JOIN dress_sizes ON dresses.dress_id = dress_sizes.dress_id
SELECT DISTINCT dress_name, size_name FROM dresses INNER JOIN dress_sizes ON dresses.dress_id = dress_sizes.dress_id INNER JOIN sizes ON dress_sizes.size_id = sizes.size_id
SELECT dress_name, order_date FROM dresses INNER JOIN orders ON dresses.dress_id = orders.dress_id
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers
